sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The FLAC package contains flac, metaflac, libFLAC, libFLAC++, libOggFLAC, libOggFLAC++ and libxmms-flac.

sect3.title: flac
sect3.para: flac is a command-line utility for encoding, decoding and converting FLAC files.

sect3.title: metaflac
sect3.para: metaflac is a program for listing, adding, removing, or editing metadata in one or more FLAC files.

sect3.title: libFLAC, libFLAC++, libOggFLAC and libOggFLAC++
sect3.para: These libraries provide native FLAC and Ogg FLAC C/C++ APIs for programs utilizing FLAC.

sect3.title: libxmms-flac
sect3.para: libxmms-flac is a plugin for XMMS.
